bug.author: ankushagarwal
bug.summary: [gcp click-to-deploy] Click to deploy web app crashes
bug.description:
Repro instructions <denchmark-code>cd components/gcp-click-to-deploy npm install npm start
# Open web ui </denchmark-code>
1.hostname: field is not editable 2. Clicking on Create Deployment crashes the web app <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/796949/41803514-81c5b71c-763e-11e8-9171-6aa2b6fe635e.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: The outstanding PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/1054>#1054</denchmark-link> already fixes this, but it was stuck on failing tests. I'm rerunning them now, will merge if they pass.
This shouldn't happen anymore now that the PR is merged, can you confirm and close the issue?
